'''Xiuhua''' is an open-world [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. She can found near the docks, standing by the entrance of the [[Baiju Guesthouse]].

Her twin sister is [[Yuhua]], a waitress at the [[Wangshu Inn]]. From time to time, the two will switch places at their respective establishments.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Xiuhua:''' Greetings, are you here to take a meal, or to find a room for the night?
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Xiuhua:''' I'm Xiuhua, one of the service staff here at the Baiju Guesthouse.
::{{DIcon}} What's your story?
::'''Xiuhua:''' I'm just one of the serving staff. Nothing special.
::'''Xiuhua:''' Except, sometimes I switch places with my [[Yuhua|twin sister]]... Please don't be unsettled when that happens!
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Xiuhua:''' You are always welcome at the Baiju Guesthouse. Come by any time!
{{Dialogue End}}
